channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Reviews Plus
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Reviews Plus

item.title: CVE-2021-24894|2024-08-03T19:49:14.027Z -- unknown -- reviews%20plus
item.description: The Reviews Plus WordPress plugin before 1.2.14 does not validate the submitted rating, allowing submission of long integer, causing a Denial of Service in the review section when an authenticated user submit such rating and the reviews are set to be displayed on the post/page
